headers.subject: [tosdr:1961] Tumblr provides access to previous TOS and privacy policy

html:
You will find a link to prior versions of our Terms of Service below. We have stored these versions on GitHub, which will also allow you to compare different versions and see what terms have changed:

http://github.com/tumblr/policy/commits/master/terms-of-service.txt

 

 You will find a link to prior versions of our Privacy Policy below. We have stored these versions on GitHub, which will also allow you to compare different versions and see what terms have changed:

http://github.com/tumblr/policy/commits/master/privacy-policy.txt



http://www.tumblr.com/policy/en/privacy

 http://www.tumblr.com/policy/en/terms_of_service

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
---
You received this message because you are subscribed to the Google Groups "Terms of Service; Didn't Read" group.

To post to this group, send email to tosdr@googlegroups.com.
Visit this group at http://groups.google.com/group/tosdr?hl=en.
For more options, visit https://groups.google.com/groups/opt_out.
